Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] Upon entering his Main Phase, the turn player has the ability to perform any action he can legally perform during the Main Phase, which includes Summoning a Monster. The opponent will not be able to activate "Maxx "C"" until Player A has passes to him. However, nothing is stopping the opponent from activating "Maxx "C"" in the Standby Phase.\n2. [FORUM] "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" is Special Summoned in the damage step. You cannot activate "Maxx "C"" in the damage step.
